title: Sultanas
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Dried fruit industry - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Food industry and trade - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Grape industry - Australia
abstract: This film documents the growing, harvesting, drying, inspection, cleaning packing and export of Australia's sun dried sultanas in Mildura, Victoria.
description: This documentary focuses on the Australian sultana industry in Mildura, Victoria and depicts the whole process from growing through to harvesting through to the export of sultanas to Canada.There is also descriptions as to why the Murray River region has ideal climatic conditions for growing sultanas.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002055; Highlights from Victoria's Murray Region captured on film; Active; 2011
